title: 70s watchface for Android Wear
summary: Seventies watch face brings the design of the 1970s to your wrist.
description: 70s watch face brings the design of the 1970s to your wrist. Get funky by downloading this free 70s watch face. Seventies will look absolutely gorgeous on your Moto 360 or rectangular smartwatches such as the Gear Live and the GWatch. Best thing is, it is for free.★★★★★This free analog Android Wear face features: -Date of the month-Week day on circular face-Customized dimmed mode to save battery This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.★★★★★Visit our exclusive wearface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4.  Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces.Experience the timeless design of the Seventies. Manufactured with love in Germany
descriptionHTML:
70s watch face brings the design of the 1970s to your wrist.

Get funky by downloading this free 70s watch face. Seventies will look absolutely gorgeous on your Moto 360 or rectangular smartwatches such as the Gear Live and the GWatch. Best thing is, it is for free.

★★★★★

This free analog Android Wear face features:

-Date of the month
-Week day on circular face
-Customized dimmed mode to save battery

This watch face is for rectangular smartwatches such as the Samsung Gear Live and round watches such as the Moto 360.

★★★★★

Visit our exclusive wearface collection for Android Wear on the Play Store http://goo.gl/QOsOu4. Also please let us know if you like to have any other watch faces to be added to our selection of watch faces.

Experience the timeless design of the Seventies.

Manufactured with love in Germany
comments: Burn In Issues Great, absolutely love the watch face however am having burn in issues after only two hours of always on mode in ambient on a LG G Watch Urbane. Will not use for the moment until whites in ambient have been resolved..
Funkalicious Makes me want to go all John Travolta Saturday Night Fever every time I look at it! Let's get down & get funky!  Nice watch face & great read ability.
The best watchface for square watches No other watch face looks as good as this one on square watches. The dull orange color matches the band of the asus zenwatch perfectly!
Best watch face so far Tried lots of different faces but always come back to this one. I actually prefer the ambient mode face than the full on face. Maybe offer that as a separate face?
It's not perfect... There's no battery meter or weather but I just like it. I think it's the ambient mode.
Very good None of the hideous hand jump when the screen turns on the Moto 360 unlike other faces. Battery usage acceptable too
recentChanges: -Also check our other free watch faces http://goo.gl/QOsOu4
